#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

long long arr[100001];
long long dp[100001];
int main()
{
	int t, n;

	cin >> t;
	while (t--)
	{
		cin >> n;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
			cin >> arr[i];
		dp[0] = 0;
		dp[1] = arr[0];
		for (int i = 2; i <=n; i++)
		{
			dp[i] = max(dp[i - 1], arr[i-1] + dp[i-2]);
		}
		cout << dp[n] << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
